      • play

        public static void play(SoundBuffer s,
        float vol)
        Plays a sound from a SoundBuffer
        Parameters:
        s - SoundBuffer containing to sound to play
        vol - Gain applied to the sound

      • getSource

        public static Sound getSource()
        Retrieves a valid sound source buffer on the audio hardware that is unused. Since there are a limited number of sound buffers available, the manager must allocate them dynamically as new sounds are played.
        Returns:
        A valid, unused sound source object.

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
        Initalize OpenAL. Call once on program start.
